Package org.eclipse.ecf.presence

Interface Summary
IAccountManager  
IChatID Adapter interface for chatIDs.
IInvitationListener  
IMessageListener Listener for text IM messages.
IMessageSender Interface for sending text messages (IM) between users.
IParticipantListener  
IPresence  
IPresenceContainer Top-level container interface for setting up listeners for presence messages, text messages, subscription requests, and for getting interfaces for message sending (IMessageSender) presence updates (IPresenceSender) and account management (IAccountManager)
IPresenceListener Listener for receiving and processing presence update events
IPresenceSender Send presence change events to remotes on buddy list
IRosterEntry  
IRosterGroup  
ISharedObjectMessageListener  
ISubscribeListener Listener for handling notifications of subscribe/unsubscribe requests

AbstractPresenceContainer An abstract presence container implementation
IMessageListener.Type  
IPresence.Mode A type-safe enum class to represent the presence mode information
IPresence.Type A type-safe enum class to represent the presence type information
IRosterEntry.InterestType  
PresencePlugin The main plugin class to be used in the desktop.
